description: A Luxury apartment by the sea on Nitza boulevard . This modern apartment lounge/dining room has a  spectacular view to the mediterranean Sea.Located just a few minute walk from the city center and the central square (Kikar Haàtzmaut) Just below you can find a supermarket and also some great restaurants. the apartment is suitable for 6 guests (couples, families or groups)

reviews.comments: A spacious apartment, spotless rooms, stunning view.

Daniel's Airbnb was spacious, clean, and comfortable. My friends and I had the best weekend in Netanya all thanks to Daniel's Airbnb! The apartment is central to multiple beaches and a very close walk to the city center and multiple groceries. Daniel was quick to respond with any questions we had and he was very accommodating with our requests!! Whenever we make a return trip to Netanya, we will be sure to book Daniel's place in advance.

Daniels apartment in Netanya was everything my family and I needed. There was a great view. Lots of room with 3 bedrooms and huge open floor plan living room. The location was perfect for walking to the beach or to the main city center with lots of restaurants and shops. Daniel was very easy to reach, and he was very flexible with us for checkout.

Daniel is a very nice guy and super helpful too! He allowed us a late check-out time because we had lots of gear we were concerned about leaving in a car unattended. The Condo view is amazing and the apartment is very nice.  Beds are comfortable too!

we entered the apartment and wasn't cleaned from the last person, dirty linen, ditry kitchen, dirty floors, he sent a cleaner the next day, when i asked for compensation or discount he said he can give me $30 off if i stay another night bad service...

Beautiful apartment with stunning views of the sea in an excellent location. There were a few little details that need attending to which we have messaged the owners about but overall we loved our stay in this apartment.

Lovely apartment with an unforgettable view of the sea and sunsets !! Very helpful owner!
The apartment is large, spacious, the beds are comfortable !!! We spent an unforgettable vacation!
Very clean and comfortable,great view of the water and great location.

The flat is a great place to spend some days in the city. It has a huge living room with a lot of space and a great view on the sea. The beach is close and the main square of the city isn’t far either. The apartment was clean and everything you need is available (kitchen equipment, washing machine, enough towels,...)
We highly recommend the flat, especially if you’re a bigger group.
Beautiful view from living room

Great apartment with stunning views. Well equipped . Great host. Dealt with everything required immediately. Gave us some extra time at checkout as our flight home was later in the day. We would highly recommend this accommodation!
Great place..great location..definitely recommend
Location is good, parking available. View from the window of 8th floor is nice

Very well located
Daniel is helpful
The picture show a large living room with a very nice sea view
The building is pretty old, but the flat is modern and comfortable

Big and spacious apartments at the first line from the sea with huge panoramic windows and amazing sea view. Suits for big company or big family. Building is a bit old but the apartments itself has fair value. The place is very close to the city center with restaurants and shops. So, everything you need is in walking distance.
Daniel is a great host, all the communication was clear and fast.

Daniel is very responsive, the appartment is clean , you have a nice view of the seaside, large windows towards it, and private parking. The building is a bit old and contrasts a bit with the apartment, not a problem if you don't plan spending time on the building stairs :)

Very nice clean appartment. It is ideal for big company: three separate bedrooms and one realy big living room. There is everything you need for comfortable staying. Very near to the see. Have private parking that is very important if you travel by car. Daniel is very nice man, always ready to help.
the apartments has a good location. it is close to the beach and supermarket. Daniel answered for all our questions very quickly. i can advise these apartments for families with kids.

Даниэль замечательный человек! Хорошо встретил, терпеливо ждал (наш приезд откладывался с 10:00, в итоге были только в 18:00). У нас с собой было 12 чемоданов, Даниэль помог их занести в квартиру, всё подробно объяснил. Квартира полностью соответствует фото, просторная и с прекрасным видом на море, в паре шагов есть магазин и ресторанчики, так же рядом удобный пляж. Отдохнули прекрасно, всё очень удобно. Однозначно рекомендую отдыхать у Даниэля!

דניאל ואשתו מארחים מעולים,
דאגו לנו לכל דבר, אנשים מקסימים, מיקום אין יותר טוב מזה, נקי למופת, נוף לים עוצר נשימה, הדירה מאובזרת לכל מה שצריך..... מאוד ממליץ!

הדירה של דניאל במיקום מדהים, ממש כמה דקות הליכה למרכז נתינה ופחות לים.
דניאל איש מאוד נחמד והיה זמין בכל רגע. למרות שהוא השאר לנו מפתח כדי להיכנס הוא דאג להגיע קצת אחר שהגענו לבדוק שהכל בסדר.
אני ממש ממליצה על הדירה של דניאל למי שרוצה להיות כמה ימים בנתניה.
Daniels flat is in an amazing position, only a few minutes walk to the center of Netanya and across the road to the beach.
Daniel is friendly and helpful. Even though he'd left us a key to get into the flat he arrived a few minutes later to check that everything was alright
I would definately recommend Daniel's flat to anyone wanting to stay in Netanya

Très bel appartement
Daniel est très attentionné
Vue magnifique spacieux
Merci
Âpparement très bien situé avec vu exeptionnelle immeuble à rénover appartement très spacieux à rafraîchir au niveau sdb et chambre pièce de vie très fonctionnelle
d avoir un hôte a l ecoute

Magnifique vue, très bien situé.
Daniel nous a reservé un accueil très chaleureux et s'est rendu disponible et à l'écoute

Merci Daniel pour votre réactivité, très bonne communication. Nous lui avons fait part d’une remarque, il a été attentif et a fait preuve de beaucoup d’attention en nous emmenant une cafetière pour le café ainsi qu’un grille pain. Bravo et merci pour ce geste qui fût très apprécié.
Appartement conforme, Vue MAGNIFIQUE, Daniel réactif et disponible

Très belle appartement pour la famille et très spacieux
Il offre une très belle vue sur la mer.
Daniel était très sympa et très disponible

Thanks to Daniel for the warm welcome. The apartment is well located, near the promenade and the stairs to the beach. Large and bright living room is really impressive. Very beautiful view of the sea, sky and sun. Daniel has always been in touch with Whatsup. The beaches in Netanya are gently sloping with finely rammed sand. The sea is great. A 10-minute walk away is the main street of Netanya and the promenade with restaurants.
There were minor flaws that I told Daniel about and he promised me to fix them.

Спасибо Даниелю за теплый прием. Квартира хорошо расположена, рядом находится набережная и лестница на пляж. Большая и светлая гостинная действительно впечатляет. Очень красивый вид на море, небо и солнце. Даниель всегда был на связи по Ватсап. Пляжи в Нетании пологие с мелким сильноутрамбованным песком. Море отличное. В 10 минутах ходьбы расположена главная улица Нетании и набережная с ресторанчиками.
Были и мелкие недостатки, о которых я рассказал Даниелю и он обещал мне их исправить.
Просторная чистая квартира рядом с морем, подойдет для большой компании.

description: Welcome to my beautiful apartment which is located in the famous Frishman street. 3 bedrooms apartment. Fully equipped kitchen and bathrooms.  5mn walking to Frishman Beach and Dizengoff Square. It's a perfect apartment for families!

reviews.comments: This apartment is absolutely wonderful!  The location couldn’t be better and the host is very communicative, flexible and accommodating.  I would stay here again in a heartbeat.
Amazing host, and awesome apartment! We had a great time.. We also asked for a late checkout and they were able to accommodate! Thanks again.

Had a great time, location is amazing, steps from restaurants, bars and beach! The unit was super clean and welcoming, AC in every room,
Highly recommend and will definitely go again!

The good:
- This place has the best location! it is situated perfectly in the center of Tel Aviv, near restaurants, bars, the beach, and everything you want to do in the city. And it is in a quiet building, no excessive noise.
- The apartment is big. It is spacious and very impressive. very good place to host your friends for dinner, or have a family vacation.
- The water heater works great, and the water pressure is wonderful in the shower.

The bad:
- The apartment cleanliness is not good. we arrived to a dusty apartment with unclean floors, surfaces, toilets, and dishes. Even though the host immediately responded by sending the apartment's cleaning lady the next day, he did not instruct her to clean the entire apartment and wanted us to tell him exactly what to clean. At the end we were left to deal with a very angry cleaning lady who speaks only Russian. The apartment was left unclean after she left.
- The bedroom TV does not work at all (it turns on, but that's about it). Both the living room and bedroom TVs are of very poor quality (not even smart TVs) and not good size.
- The other 2 bedrooms have very small beds, so know that it is more suitable for a family with kids rather than a group of friends.
Amazing place with the best location in all of Tel Aviv!
Great clean apartment in a good location with responsive hosts.
Great apartment. Perfect location in Tel Aviv. Communication with host was quick and easy. Would love to stay again!
Great all around. Very nice place. Makes it hard to leave.

Adi’s place was great. Smooth check-in process (with someone waiting for us to let us in earlier than the official check-in time), modern furnishings, good kitchen, and laundry (washer + dryer) in-unit.

Location was good too — 10 minute walk to the beach, and close to several good restaurants (we really liked Anastasia, especially for vegans).

Exactly as listed, would stay again!
The entire experience staying at the apartment was great. We enjoyed it very much and highly recommend it.
Perfecto location. Walking distance to everything. They were very flexible to help us leave luggage and check in and check out. I will recommend it 100%
reviews.response: Thanks!

reviews.comments: Adi's place is a modern, spacious, apartment in the perfect location for a taste of the Tel Aviv social scene.  As has been said before, the space is even better than the pictures describe. We couldn't be more pleased with having stayed there and would do so again when visiting Tel Aviv.

Adi is a wonderful host, and the location of this apartment is in the heart of tel aviv. You walk right outside and have so many bars and restaurants to choose from, and everything is walking distance. We had a wonderful stay!
Beautiful apartment in an incredible location!!!   Highly recommend!

We loved it here! Had 5 people total and it slept us all easily and there was enough couch/living space for us all to hang out in the evenings. Really close to the beach and downtown. Highly recommend!
Excellent location, beautiful apartment, great decor.   Would definitely book again

Amazing location, 5 minutes away from the beach walking distance, best area in the city, great kitchen.
We had great responses for the check in, and also left the key inside the apartment after a High Holiday and we were able to get back in within a short period of time.
I highly recommend this place.
Great location - super central! Apt itself is very clean. Was a great stay!

Staying with Adi was a blessing she was helpful and answered each and every question we had. The location is amazing and is right in the center of where you want to be in Tel Aviv. Great food near by and great beaches. Couldn’t have had a better place to stay at. Thank you Adi!!
Perfect location. Clean and specious. Really enjoyed my stay.

We had a very good time in Tel Aviv. The location is excellent and the apartment is bright clean and spacious. Do not be concerned about the exterior and lot of the apartments look old and unkempt from the outside. Inside however the apartment was clean and modern and spacious and could easily and comfortably accommodate our family of 6. The  wine and cookies were also a thoughtful touch.

Great location, nice large living area. It was not very noisy, as some customers commented. 5 min walk to a nice kid friendly beach. Beach toys were a plus for our 5 y. old. Adi had a great communication throughout.
Great Location for Tel Aviv, nearby restaurants and beautiful beaches, very cozy place

We really enjoyed our stay in this apartment.  It is very central, easy walk to the great beach and fantastic cafes for breakfast and dinner.  The kitchen has all that you need and it only takes minutes to grab something across the street, one of the best pita places in Israel is two steps away.   There is a construction going on nearby, which didn't really bother us, because we were gone most of the day, but you might want to check with the host, if you have issues with that.  We really loved this place and highly recommend it!

Me and my sister had a great time staying here.  Wonderful space and very seamless check in and check out process. The bedrooms are spacious and can easily accommodate a large group. The kitchen is large with a large table to accommodate all your guests. Great location. highly recommend!

The location was great! Quick walk to the beach and to Dizengoff street, where all the action is. The apartment itself met our needs but we expected more. There was a bottle of wine waiting for us which was a nice plus.

This apartment was very beautiful and clean! It was in the perfect location in Tel Aviv. Right next to all the best restaurants. The host was prompt with answering any questions that I had. I will definitely stay there again when I come back to Israel. Thank you for making my family and I have such a wonderful stay.

Adi and Ido were great hosts. We had a comfortable stay at their place. Check-in instructions were clear and Ido (Adi's husband) communicated promptly on (Hidden by Airbnb) . They even checked with us if we needed anything next morning. Parking was a bit challenging in the city (was expected) but other than that everything was great.

This is in a very central location next to famous Dezingof Street in Tel Aviv 5 min from the beach and lots of amazing food options. Totally worth the value with good price. The apartment was family friendly with toys and everything that kept kids happy and comfortable. There was even a high chair for little ones in the dining area.

Wish the carpet in the living room was a bit more cleaner though but considering all other things it did not bother us.

Thank you so much for letting us stay at your place❤️

Definitely recommend having Adi and Ido as your host!
It's an amazing pick for the price!
The pictures of the apartment are misleading. The place look terrible

The main space is full of light and very specious. the bedrooms are not as beautiful or well lit, but are functional, and the mattress in the main bedroom is great. the kitchen is well equipped. We are a family of four and dined in every day. However, you could easily eat out, as the location is central and there are lots of amenities and restaurants around. This means however the the flat is not very quiet. the only quiet bedroom is the main one.
The flat could have been a bit cleaner, but it was reasonably clean. All and all I would recommend it!
The location is fantastic and the apartment is spacious and very comfortable. Close to many grocery stores and just a short walk to the sea. We would definitely rent it again.
Very central and noisy
Adi was amazing host and helps us with everything we needed. The apartment is located at the central of Tel Aviv, and also 5 minutes from the beach. It was great experience.
reviews.response: Thanks!

reviews.comments: Great Location and spacious apartment! Perfect for families also. Would highly recommend
reviews.response: Thanks Daniel!

reviews.comments:
Large specious space for families and friend to social and relax. Great kitchen for cooking together. Large dining table with large windows. We enjoyed our stay. Location is steps from restaurants, the arts, shopping. We enjoyed our week to be able to walk to the fountain.
If you have a car you may want to consider alternative. Parking is a challenge. We parked in the parking garage a few blocks away. However, long waiting periods to get inside and if available.
Host was professional and easy to access the unit with self check in.

HM/RM Florida, USA

We came with an infant, and they were able to rent a crib for us for 8 dollar US a day :) Ido and Adi our family can't thank you enough for everything ❤️
reviews.response: Thanks Annie!

reviews.comments: Excellent location! So close to the beach and bars and restaurants. Can't recommend the location enough! Don't be put off by the shabby building exterior - the apartment is modern inside. However, the bunk bed room needs a clean up - broken mirror and noisy AC unit. Given the great central location though comes with the expected noise levels at night time - this didn't bother us too much but might be an issue for people travelling with children.

Fantastic location, although can at times be slightly noisy with the nearby works going on. Beach is 10 mins walk and the apartment is modern and spacious. Perfect for families, and small groups of friends!
Stylish, brilliantly located and comfortable apartment just a few minutes' walk from Frishman Beach and good cafes, restaurants etc.
Good location near the beach but sometimes noise at night.
Great flat is an excellent location. Adi and Deborah were really helpful with our check out and our stay was an absolute pleasure. Thanks so much!

We stayed at the appartment from 1. -5. May.  We were a group of 4 people and we enjoyed our stay a lot. The appartment was clean, all amenities provided as described and check in and communication with the host in general worked very good. The appartments best feature is the location. If you want to enjoy the city and the beach, this is a perfect spot.
Fantastic apartment in great location. Adi was a delight to deal with and extremely responsive to any request.
fantastic location adi was great host and everything was very efficient
For me it’s the best position to visit Tel Aviv , Appartament is perfect with everything , but very noisy , for night life and traffic in the morning ..

Our family of 5 had a pleasant stay at the apartment for 4 days in June. We enjoyed the local scene, particularly all the nearby cafes and restaurants in Dizengoff St. We also spent a lot of time at the local beaches, they are only a few minutes walk away. Thanks Adi for the quick responses and for the bottle of wine!
Really very good spacious and bright.  But a bit too much noise from street and local bars late at night.

Beautiful apartment!
Amazing thoughtful touches, exceptionally clean. Great position, spacious and room large apartment.
reviews.response: Thank you. Hope to host you again!

reviews.comments:
Very well located apartment. 5 minutes of walk to Yafo beach and close to many bars and restaurants. The place is not suitable for sensible sleepers, because the windows provide zero sound-proof against the street noise.
The twin beds in one of the bedrooms are really small and not suitable for an adult.

Adi and the other guys were very nice and responsive.
The apartment is nice and spacious but noisy more than most of the central apartments we've been to in the past. If you don't mind about this, you will enjoy prime location and nice amenities.
Adi's place was great - fantastic location. I would definitely stay there again.

Very nice hosts, sensational contact. Answered every question very quickly. The flat is very nice, close to the sea, shops and restaurants.
A place worth recommending

Trying to maintain the highest standards of luxury, but with homely cozyness.Please contact me if you have any questions, I would be happy to help make your stay in Kadima as pleasant as only possible. transit: Supermarket, busstop, mikve, synagoge, forest...all walking distanceWe are a 10 minutes drive from Beit Yoshua train station, with trains going to the Airport . We are 45 km from the airport.

reviews.comments: Comfortable and modern.  Hosts were a wealth of information about where to eat  and what to see.  A lovely place.

First of all, Mrs. Gabriella is the most amazing person I've met as a renter on AirBnb. She offered to make coffee and we had some amazing conversations and she gave me many tips on how to do things in Israel. Her husband is also a very helpful and nice person, he helped me with reading a contract in Hebrew. Their house is amazing; it has an amazing pool and a well landscaped backyard with the shade of beautiful trees. The room that I got had new sheets, plenty of towels, even a bathrobe. I highly, highly recommend their place.

Mrs. Gabriella was a wonderful hostess! She was kind, warm, and very pleasant to converse with.

The Villa was lovely and the food and drink were great.

a great place for a getaway. :) Pool, yard, all the amenities in the kitchen for cooking, beautiful house! The room was great and spacious and we also had private bathroom
the house was spotless clean which is sometimes rare for Israel! I recommend this place
As always our trip was great.  Gabrriella and Ronnie are great hosts.   Very relaxing and lovely pool.  It was our 3rd stay there and would definitely do it again.

Dear Gabriella, thank you so much for having us at your beautiful home, or beautiful paradise, I should say. We had a wonderful day - your pool is magical, the room was spacious and inviting, everything was very clean and pleasant, and even your cute dog Sasha made us feel wanted and welcome  Thank you!! We will surely want to come again
I have stayed with Mrs Gabriella about 2 years ago.  It was great and peaceful and relaxing.  Highly recommend.  Great value for money and the hosts are great.
Gabriella is an amazing host, so welcoming. The place is really calm and relaxing. We only were a little disappointed about the pool not being clean.

I can’t say enough good things about our stay at Gabi and Rony’s beautiful house.

Everything and I really do mean everything was beyond perfect! From Gabi’s warm welcome to her amazing coffee to offering to wash our laundry, to the helpful tips for visiting Jerusalem (thanks Rony!!) made our time in Israel better than we could have ever expected.

I’m not sure how I’m going to be able to stay at a regular Air BnB now that I’ve stayed here!!

Next time I’m in Israel, I know where I’m staying!!

I loved the house owners
I loved the property
I loved the piecefull experience
It was perfect!
I loved feeling so comfortable as if it was my home

זה היה פשוט חלום. אנשים מאוד נחמדים, מקום חלומי.
It was amazing, pleasant people and a wonderful experience. Clean, high standards, and very comfortable.

Firstly, the Hostess; Gabriella is an hospitable, amiable, congenial, convivial, cordial and gregarious hostess. (As we would say in the US a "Hostess with the Mostest"). One could almost come to the villa just to visit her. She is also extremely knowledgeable about the area and can guide you to the best the area has to offer in dinning, touring and other activities (horse riding - her speciality, scuba etc)

The accommodation; literally as is described in the listing - but better. We took two rooms; the "White room" best for privacy and quiet, and the "Pink room" which is lighter and airier. Both were well appointed and spacious. The entire villa is an extremely well planned and decorated. Every corner is something to see, admire. If you are looking for a central place to be - or just relax and chill by the pool and BBQ, then this is the place. We can say we are looking forward to coming again.

Most definitely worth a visit/ stay. I would most warm-heartedly recommend to my friends/ family.
reviews.response: Thank you for your wonderful feedback, which  motivated so much !

reviews.comments:
Gabi and Roni were the perfect hosts. Such a lovely couple. They made us feel so welcome into their home. They did everything they could to make us feel at home and to help us with our queries. It is such a beautiful house with everything you could want for a week of luxury. Even dressing gowns and slippers! The bird song was incredibly sweet and amusing but so refreshing to listen to everyday.

We needed a rest and were happy to laze around the pool and house for a few days, but if you want to get around you would need a car.

We highly recommend this listing and would definitely stay again. Thank you for such a lovely time! x

Gabriella's place is exactly as decribed, gorgeous, spacious, quiet and the hostess and her husband really exceeded my expectations. They are very friendly and extremly helpfull and dedicated! On there were grapes from their own garden in my room as well as water for my welcome and on Saturday I was even surprised with a very nice breakfast on their terrace! The pool was wonderfull to have a nice morning swim in and their lovely dog Daisy even tried to assist me with some swimmng lessons ;-) All in all I had a wonderfull and very relaxing time and I hope that the next time I get to Israel I will be able to stay in their place because it truly felt a little bit like home. Thank you both so much and hope to see you soon!

Warm regards KP
reviews.response: thank you for your terrific feed back!

reviews.comments:
Our hostess was there to meet us and offered to take our luggage to our room.

The accommodation was exactly as described on the web site. The pool was certainly a bonus .

This was our first visit to the area and had no problem in finding the address .

We would certainly recommend this accomodation to anybody looking to stay in that area.
reviews.response: Dear Jack, thank you for your positive feed back. we will look into the bathroom ventilation issue.

reviews.comments:
המקום קסום וגבי מקסימה.
צריך לקחת בחשבון שחדר אירוח נמצא בתוך הבית שלגבי, כלומר אין כניסה נפרדת. המטבח גם הוא משותף עם הבעלים. אנשים מקסימים!
יש כסא מסאג' מפנק, כלבים מקסימים והטבע מושלם!
תודה!

במרחב הקסום הזה נשארנו ארבעה ימים בלי צורך לצאת, פשוט גן עדן של מקום.. אירוח נעים, משותף בגוד ווייבס, מאפשר ומפנק!! החל מהפרטים הקטנים כמו חלוקים מפנקים, קרח בכל הגרסאות מהמקרר, בריכה פרטית לחלוטין ומקסימום אווירה... תודה על חופשה אידיאלית!!

הייתה שהות מקסימה! אירוח לבבי וביתי
צ'ק אין קל ופשוט. החדר גדול ושירותים ומקלחת צמודים ונוחים. נהנו מאוד!

אירוח מקסים! הזוג חם ונעים מאד. נותן 100% פרטיות מצד אחד, ומצד שני תחושת אירוח חמה.
מומלץ מאד! קיבלנו קומה שלמה משלנו שכללה כל מה שצריך, וגם החצר והמתחם של הבריכה היה כל הזמן לרשותנו. כמובן שגבריאלה ורוני דאגו לכל מה שהיינו צריכים והיו זמינים תמיד. אהבנו מאד❤️
גבריאלה ובעלה היו מקסימים.  נתנו לנו יחס חם ואת השקט שלנו, זוג חביב מאוד. המקום יפה בצורה בלתי רגילה, ומרגישים באמת בחופשה. הניקיון, המחיר, היופי נותנים חוויה טובה מאוד. מומלץ!

תודה לרוני וגבריאלה המקסימים על ארוח לבבי מאוד נהננו להתארח .הבית הרבה יותר יפה במציאות מקום של רוגע שלווה ושקט.מקום נקי מסודר ומאובזר.תודה לרוני שהואיל בטובו להוריד לנו סרט ולהציגו במקרן ממש הרגשנו בקולנוע במיוחד בישיבה על הכורסאות הנוחות .נשמח להתארח שוב בקרוב .

Bij mrs. Gabriella geniet je van een ruime, rustige en prachtige villa met alle faciliteiten die je vakantie luxe en compleet maken. Maar het is niet alleen de villa die de vakantie onvergetelijk maakt. Mrs. Gabriella zelf is een uitmuntende en hartverwarmende gastvrouw, die je veel tips geeft om Israel te ontdekken en optimaal te ontspannen en genieten van je reis.
Notre arrivée était tardive mais notre hôte était ravie de nous accueillir, de discuter au salon et nous offrir une collation.
reviews.response:
Dear Corine,

Thank you for you honest and sraightforward feedback. We will work on to improving these points! warmest regards gabriella

description: WE HAVE NUMEROUS  APARTMENTS AVAILABLE - GET IN TOUCH FOR AVAILABILITY AND MULTIPLE BOOKINGSApartment lifestyle in a stunning beachside location!Comfortable & spacious serviced apartments at the Okeanos ApartHotel Features fully equipped kitchen, underground parking, pool (passover till the end of September), sauna, gym and lobby with 24/7 doorman are all included!SPECIAL OFFER: FREE weekly cleaning services!More room types can be found here: https://www.airbnb.com/users/5892224/listingsThe spaceSituated in a gorgeous coastal location in Herzliya overlooking the beach and twinkling turquoise sea, Okeanos Aparthotel is sandwiched between Herzliya’s beaches and the equally famous hi-tech business district of Herzliya. A short walk away, Herzliya’s acclaimed marina, Arena shopping mall, restaurants and bars can all be discovered. With space for working, sleeping, living and relaxing, all our apartments come with fully-equipped kitchens, so you can live according to your own schedule, comfort and routine throughout your stay.At Okeanos ApartHotel, you’ll enjoy the freedom and flexibility of apartment living with the amenities and modern conveniences of a hotel.The building has a very nice gym, pool (from passover until the end of September) and sauna  as well as common outdoor space with sun chairs and lawn. There is also a 24 hour doorman, and video surveillance in the building common areas for your safety.Kitchen has marble countertops, contemporary style cabinets and is fully equipped with a big sink, refrigerator-freezer, coffee machine, kettle, toaster, microwave OR you can go out or get delivery from many near by restaurants..Wi-fi, cable tv and air conditioning is provided. Washer/dryer is available in the building.Location: Located in the heart of the popular Herzliya Marina in Herzliya B (Pituach), the Okeanos ApartHotel is a stone's throw from several popular beaches and a 2 minute walk from the upmarket Arena Wharf/shopping mall, where you will find a supermarket, a large pharmacy/drugstore, a variety of trendy shops and boutiques and a bustling waterfront strip of cafes and restaurants.While the Okeanos is centrally located and is easily accessed by car, taxi, bus and on foot - the Blue Lagoon Suite does not face onto the street side of the complex, rather it faces onto the beautiful Lagoon complex grounds and "Laguna" Yacht Marina, thereby providing guests with a true "waterfront getaway" experience.Activities: •Beach (onsite) •Pool (onsite - from passover until the end of September) •Boardwalk 100m away. •Fishing (off pier across street or water excursions 2 miles) •Bicycling (onsite) •Restaurant (onsite) •Grocery Store 1min walking •Tennis (on site)•Gym/Fitness Center (onsite) •Shopping Area (on site) •Zoo (5 miles) •Ocean (onsite) •Deep Sea Fishing (4 miles)Transport: A "private" taxi rank/station (simply ask the doorman to call you a taxi) and public buses to Herzliya, Ra'anana and Tel Aviv are located nearby. The Herzliya train station is a short bus ride away.Features: •Wi-Fi •Fully Equipped Kitchen • Parking •Central Air Conditioning •Free lounge chaise, umbrellas and towels at poolside •Sauna •Views (Ocean as well as intercostal) •Dock/Boat Slip •Outdoor Shower at Poolside •Gift shop sells basic groceries, drinks newspapers magazines coffee etc. •Shopping within 1 min of resortAmenities in apartment: •Linens Provided with beds made-up, always freshly laundered and sanitized •Bath Towels in each bathroom and assorted smaller towels •Microwave •Toaster •Refrigerator-freezer•Dishes, stemware and cutlery•High Speed Internet Wi-Fi •Cable HD Flat screen TV’s•Initial supply of hand soap, shampoo, conditioner, toilet tissue, paper towels & dishwasher detergent •Keyless entry with override manual key availableCaesarea golf club (20min driving): After renovations of about a year and an investment of over $12M., the new Caesarea Golf Club opened on 1 May 2009. Great

I stayed for nearly three weeks, couldn’t ask for better. Good communication, easy check in, secured and free parking, great amenities and amazing location.
The place is super clean and very relaxing. I would definitely do it again!
It was a pleasure. Spacious apartment (we were upgraded and it was amazing) with an amazing view of the sea.  1 min walk from the beach.  Thank you

All in all a great place.

This is definitely going to be my permanent choice for stays in Israel. The staff is incredible, considerate and helpful. The location is superb, and the apartments are brilliant. Beautiful, stylish and with great amenities.
Thank you for such a great stay!

Exceeded our expectations! Communication was great, informative and very quick, check in process was smooth, the room we got was actually larger than in the pictures, with a separate bedroom and also a separate room for our luggage. the place was sparkling clean, and there were cookies and water bottles for us on the table. The pool was great, and the beach is literally a few steps outside the building. stunning beach. Spectacular view from the 11th floor. Loved it and would love to come back

reviews.comments: The owner was readily available and willing to address any questions/issues that arose.  The apartment was spotless and comfortable.  The second bathroom was small, but usable.  Parking was including and a big help.  Overall, I would recommend the unit.
The host canceled this reservation 18 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

It's a very nice apartment in a good location.
The advantage and disadvantage - the owner actually lives there and rents it only part of the time. SO from the one hand, there is everything there that you need, but on the other, there are limitations, and not always clear what can be used and what is not.
For instance - the owner keeps Kosher, so we were asked to use disposable plates, knives, and forks. But it was almost impossible to prepare any serious lunch or dinner at the apartment.
Considering that this apartment was even more expansive from the room in a good hotel just 2 minutes walk, including breakfast, pool, and parking, those limitations need to be considered by people who do not keep Kosher, like us. Clearly that the hotel room was for 2, and this appartment can be good for 4.

a great place in a perfect location easy to communicate with the host they tried to help out as much as they could with whatever problems we had
would definitely come back

We had a wonderful time in this apartment! It’s really near the beach (literally cross the road and walk down the stairs) and the view from the window is just breathtaking! Esther is a wonderful host and the apartment basically has everything you would ever need inc lots of baby things like a crib, mat, baby swing, high chair and children’s toys which was really convenient. The fact that she usually lives there means that there is a lot of her stuff around and a lot of the cupboards are full of her stuff, but on the other hand you have a lot more amenities than in an empty vacation rental. The dryer wasn’t working which was a shame but the washing machine was perfect. We also really enjoyed the water bar and the super comfy beds. I found the lounge and the bedrooms nicer in real than in the pictures. All in all a very nice place for a great holiday in Netanya!!

We had a really lovely stay in this apartment. Esther was so friendly and accommodating and Yaniv really went out of his way to arrange all we needed. The apartment is someones home which meant it was fully equipped with anything you could possibly need including toys for the kids and amenities for shabbat (but also meant that the cupboards were full of someone else's clothes). The location was perfect, right across from the steps down to the beach and a few minutes walk to the centre. There is also a sea view which we enjoyed a lot!

We stayed in this apartment as a family of four (my wife, myself and two elementary school age children). The apartment is very clean and cozy. We had everything we needed for a very good family vacation experience. The parking is very convenient, in the back of the house. It's a step away from the beach so I went running 2-3 times a day and took a nice dip in the sea afterwards. The place is walking distance to Netaniya center which can a lot to offer in terms of shopping, restaurants, fun for the kids. Beautiful place which we liked very much and recommend without hesitation to anyone, especially families with kids.
This is a great place to stay. Clean. Near the beach and great location.
הכל היה טוב מאוד, מומלץ מאוד!

Merci à Esther pour son accueil chaleureux. Tout était parfait.L ‘appartement est spacieux et propre. Il est idéalement situé ,face à la mer et à 5minutes du centre.
Il est très bien équipé . Notre hôte a été prévenante et sympathique,présente tout en étant discrète. Si vous allez à Netanya, n’hesitez pas’c’est l’appartement idéal.

reviews.response: Thank you for your comment.  the apartment has centralized air conditioning with three integrated air outlets.  1 in the parental room.  2 in the living room / kitchen.  3 right at the entrance to the second bedroom (mamad secure bedroom).  all you have to do is leave the door open for the children's room.  When you select 20 degree with the remote control, the whole apartment is at 20 degree.

Highly recommended.
A sweet, comfortable,  tastefully decorated and clean place with  beautiful views of the sea from the bedrooms and the balcony.  Right accross the street from an ice cream shop and grocery store.

The location on this place cannot be better, no need for a car. The beach is 100 meter away, supermarket right in front of the building. There is a pub with great delivery of food open every day till 1 AM also below the building. The only noise you'll hear is the waves.

reviews.comments: The view is BEAUTIFUL.  We could even hear the waves a little.  Givat Olga is a sweet little old fashioned Israeli town where you can still see older men playing shesh besh at the cafe.  The home was sweet and there is a sea view from both the balcony .
It was a very nice stay, we loved the apartment and the location - also Nathalie was very nice and very attentive

great location, literally 2 minutes from the beach, stunning view, practical nice house, we stayed there a bunch of teenagers and it was great!
check-in and check-out were clear easy and on time.

We had a lovely stay at Nathalie’s apartment and would thoroughly recommend it. There was plenty of room for my husband, myself and our three children with comfortable bedding provided. The local amenities are good with a supermarket over the road and a shopping centre nearby. It took 5 minutes to walk to the beach which was clean and supervised by life guards. We will definitely try to book again in the future when we are next in Hadera.

Great apartment !

Останавливались у Натали в январе, апартаменты полностью соответствуют описанию и фото. Натали всегда на связи, быстро отвечает, помогает по любым вопросам. Расположение замечательное, район Гиват Ольга, 5 минут до моря, напротив дома супермаркет, есть парковка, автобусная остановка в 2-х минутах. Просторные комнаты, 2 спальни + студия, 2 санузла, огромный балкон. Кухня полностью оборудована, есть вся необходимая посуда, приборы, техника. Вообще в квартире есть все привычное и необходимое для жизни, включая телевизор, стиральную машину, утюг, фен и пр. Нам понравилось  рекомендую!
Все отлично.

Pour aller au centre ville d'Hadera choix de plusieurs bus tout les 6 mn.
Ce quartier d'Hadera est vraiment agréable.
C'est avec grand plaisir que nous reviendrons.
Nous recommandons vivement cet appartement.
Très bel appartement bien situé avec vue imprenable sur la mer. Nous avons pu apprécier les beaux couchés de soleil. Commodités proches. Appartement agréable et spacieux propre et bien équipé.

Apartament znajduje się 300 metrów od plaży publicznej, co jest jego wielką zaletą. Należy mieć ze sobą samochód, co ułatwia poruszanie się po okolicy. Na szczęście gospodarze udostępniają parking przy budynku - duże udogodnienie. Mieszkanie jest przestronne, jasne, z balkonem z pięknym widokiem na morze. Zaraz po drugiej stronie ulicy jest sklep. Okolica jest spokojna. W mieszkaniu znajdują się wszystkie potrzebne sprzęty w kuchni, więc można jak ktoś lubi żywić się na miejscu.

reviews.comments:
NICE PLACE. Host was responsive. EXCELLENT location. AMAZING VIEW.
This apartment would be perfect for a group of 20-something friends, young singles or married couples, even a family with older children. As a family with kids under 5 and a nervous grandmother, we had a few safety concerns that would not be an issue with the suitable age group.
Great host, fantastic place!
amazing

Thank you so much! The place was amazing, perfect location, stunning view, very spacious, comfortable and we really had a great weekend. The host was very happy to answer all out queries at a very fast response time. Would definitely recommend and looking forward to coming back again in the future.

The flat does not seem to have been updated since the seventies, but it has been well maintained and was clean and very spacious. It is listed as a two bedroom but in fact there is a covered and closed balcony which serves as another small room, which makes separating the kids a lot easier!

Overall, we were very happy with our stay and had a great time. The proximity to the beach is great and the pool was fantastic. The view from the balcony is phenomenal and makes up for any flaws in the apartment. The apartment is also extremely spacious.
However, the kitchen was very basically equipped. There is no air-conditioning in the main room (but there are very good portable units in the bedrooms) but because of the high floor, it really wasn’t required. There are also a few issues with regard to safety for small children - most notably the lack of locks on the windows to the balcony and the low-ish ledge over the edge of the balcony. The master bedroom’s shutters were missing some slats which meant that mornings started early! Having said this, Ilan was very receptive to the feedback we provided and I hope he’ll correct the issues we raised with him.
All was amazing. Best View Ever.
Huge apartment right on the beach!! the view is amazing!! would definitely recommend!

This view is amazing. All we wanted to do was sit and enjoy the view. The apartment is spacious and Ilan was very responsive to any question or request.
We missed the part about no ac on the listing and for the most part was ok temperature-wise as the apt had great breezes. The pool was lovely, but is an additional cost (which is also in the apt description). We hope to come back. Thanks Ilan!!
Ilan’s place is a large apartment in a prime location with a remarkable view. Ilan was always extremely responsive, patient, and helpful in preparation for our stay. Thank you Ilan!!

Отдыхали в Нетании у хозяина Stas, в сентябре 2018 года. Квартира соответствует описанию и фото, если возникали какие то трудности Stas быстро отвечал и помогал решить проблему. Расположение квартиры нам очень понравилось все в доступности и море и магазины и центральная площадь! В целом впечатление осталось хорошее и хотим поблагодарить хозяина за гостеприимство!
Appartement propre et bien situe

Хорошее расположение квартиры, не далеко от моря, рядом достаточно продуктовых магазинов и кафе, при этом ночью достаточно тихо. Квартира перед наши прибытием была практически не убрана, пол был грязным, в ванной комнате грибок, не было чашек для чая, постельное белье застиранное, серо-желтого цвета. Часть полотенец воняла рыбой, а часть была абсолютно новыми ни разу не стиранными из магазина. Хозяин, доброжелательный, приятный в общении, охотно отвечает на вопросы, даже пообещал устранить замеченные нами недостатки, но до нашего отъезда не устранил ничего. Еще один неприятный момент, хозяин потребовал плату за электричество хотя о доп. оплате во время бронирования не было указано ничего. Сам же хозяин при этом спокойно пользовался стиральной и сушильной машинами, подключенными к счетчику, по которому нам пришлось оплатить электричество. Кроме указанной проблемы с чашками, кухня оборудована вполне нормально. В целом, если самостоятельно убрать квартиру, перестирать полотенца и не переживать из-за доброжелательного равнодушия хозяина и неожиданных дополнительных расходов, вариант для проживания хороший.
Мне все понравилось! И место и пляж рядом, рестораны и магазины! И квартира! Все классно!

Замечательная квартира со свежим ремонтом и мебелью, полностью соответствует описанию. Доброжелательные хозяева, дом расположен на тихой улице, до моря 10 минут, до центральной площади 7 минут, супермаркет в 5 минутах, рынок - 15-20 минут. На соседней улице есть бесплатная парковка. Полностью рекомендую.

reviews.comments: We loved our stay at Matan's beach-side house. The beach is an easy 3 minute walk from the house, and the sound of the waves can be heard from both the bedrooms. The house had everything we needed, including a fully fitted kitchen and lines for drying towels and bathing suits. Everything was very clean and the garden was a treat!

We can't thank Matan enough for this phenomenal unforgettable stay and experience. This home is so special, has happy and relaxing ambience, it is spacious but warm at the same time, has super hip character, and the fresh laundry smell is gorgeous. Matan is a super clean, prompt, and accommodative host, he thought of everything. After 14 hours of flight, coming from Chicago, we were welcomed with the best little details, like fresh homemade amazing bread he just baked for us, a bottle of Barkan wine, as well as abundance of fresh cut flower bouquets which feels the air with smells of joy.
Communications were super quick and easy. He provided with tons of good information about the area and home and was always reachable.
This unique and homey experience is located at the coolest neighborhood - we love the narrow street passages, and the neighborhood vibes.
If you are interested in a quaint piece of true local Israel - this is the place to be! Located steps from one of the most beautiful Israeli Mediterranean beaches, near the G'dur nature preserve, a piece of heaven on earth (wish I could upload pictures) - this place is real!!
We will come back again and again, it's just what we needed!

The house with its furniture is extremely modest, but it's recently renovated and very clean.

Matan has a good taste (to my humble opinion) and a big heart. We felt as if we were staying in a friend's place.

Amazing natural beach towards South, by foot.

Very private.

Matan's place is pleasant, the house is sweet and well equipped. On July 2021, the city was building a new path to the beach, so getting to the beach requires a bit of a detour. Once construction is complete, it seems the path to the beach will be short and comfortable by foot. If you're a family or have stuff to carry to the beach, you can take a 2 minutes drive to the parking lot of the Olga beach.
Matan was extremely communicative and helpful, a great host.

The house looks great in and out and is located close to a beautiful walking dune area along the beach. Lovely house and garden, well equipped and large enough for our group of 3 adults and 2 small children. Matan was very welcoming, great communication too. Warmly recommended.

additional_house_rules:
Just to make sure we're on the same page ;)

• Yup. You can check-in/out independently 24/7 if you check in AFTER 3 pm and check out BEFORE 10 am.

• We will send you full directions 1 day prior to your arrival.

• We prepare the place by default according to the number of guests shown in the reservation (2 guests = 2 towels = 1 set of sheets = 1 double bed), and supply 1 towel per 1 guest (indoors use only) for the entire time of your stay.

• Please respect our neighbors and don't be too loud (especially don't play loud music after 23:00). Obviously, lock the house when you're gone and shut down ALL electricity.

• Please – No smoking (there is a fire detector at the apartment)  / No late check-outs without approval - if one of these occurs during your stay, a 100$ fee will be billed to your account.

• The final price refers to guests visiting Israel on a tourist visa (B2/B3/B4). Other guests, or guests who don't present a copy of their border control and government-issued ID, will be charged an additional 17% VAT.

•  המחיר המוצג לא כולל מע"מ עבור אזרחי ותושבי ישראל. לאחר ביצוע ההזמנה תשלח אליכם בקשה לתשלום 17% מע""מ.

• Also, this is not mandatory but greatly appreciated - You will get the place clean and tidy, please give it back in a good condition, and not a total mess :)

••• We wish you a great stay, thank you for choosing to stay at our place! •••

A stylish, clean studio apartment tucked into a nice neighborhood with some great restaurants in walking distance. My husband enjoyed having a relaxing evening and morning cup of coffee at the cafe right next door.  The bed was extremely comfortable with plenty of pillows and the walk-in shower was great! We tried to communicate with the host - but they dont provide a direc path for coommunications - only a remote reception number with a person working for them having no clue and no means to help besides saying "im trying to contact the staff at the place and waiting for their response".

Before our arrival, we sent a messege sterring how important the cleanliness is to us since since the guest (my family) is a recovering cancer patient after bone-marrow transplant - and still, the bed was dirty! The walls had food-stains on them! The floor was messy with hair and dirt.
We specifically asked if the place is quite, but its located just above an espcially noisy place. When the cleaning person walked in, my guest got so scared she packed everything up a once and called me frightent to come pick her up asap.

We really feel we got scammed here. Sad experience.

She even offered to stock the fridge before my arrival and it was just perfect. From the apartment you can walk (20 min)or drive (5 min) to the beautiful Golden Beach or explore additional amazing beaches in the area. The Cesarea port has beautiful restaurants all within a 10 min drive. The nearby town of Pardes Hannah has a hip vibe, with countless opportunities for relaxing spas, massage, Water Shiatsu and much more. The studio has everything you need for a carefree vacation, including ample free parking, pool, gym, tennis courts as well as serene, quiet and blissful surroundings. I will certainly stay here in my next visit to Israel!

Отличный ремонт, новая мебель, мини кухня в номере (есть холодильник, электроплитка, микроволновая печь, вся необходимая посуда. В номере так же есть душ и туалет, телевизор, кондиционер. Большая даухспальная кровать + диван, который раскладывается. Самый центр города, центральный пляж, площадь Независимости со всеми развлечениями, магазины, рестораны, кафе и конечно же свежий морской воздух круглосуточно!

reviews.comments: Отдыхала в Нетании в сентябре 2019 года. Студия находится в 7-10 минутах от пляжа и шаговой доступности от центральной площади Нетании. Прогулка по набережной , которая находится в пяти минутах ходьбы, доставит вам удовольствие. В комнате есть все необходимое для комфортного отдыха! Комната убирается ежедневно. Полотенца меняются каждый день! Связаться с хозяйкой Светланой нет ни каких проблем. Она всегда на связи и если возникнут какие проблемы , поможет их решить , ответит на все волнующие вас вопросы! Рекомендую !
Super  je recommande, super à l’écoute

Гостили в квартире у Светланы всего несколько дней, но было уютно и чисто, уборка через день, 4 полотенца на каждого человека, чистое хорошее постельное белье, душевые принадлежности. В соотношении цены/качества очень хороший вариант. В двух шагах центральная площадь, магазины, кафе, набережная, до пляжа 5 минут. Все очень понравилось!!! Спасибо!

reviews.comments: Overall my wife and I had a really lovely time in Mrs. Abramowitz's home. It was a very short walk to the beach and was perfectly located for our needs (nearby wedding). There is a lovely deck with ocean views and a nice rooftop space. While the home itself is very nice there were many areas which had accumulated clutter and could use some cleaning.

we had a wonderful vacation
a very nice place with an amazing roof to see the beautiful sunsets.
clean and equipped with everything we needed.
the beach is very close
we'd love to return for another vacation!

Maayans place in Tzukei Yam is proof that apparently heaven is 25 min away from Tel Aviv…

Great view of the Mediterranean from bedroom window, a two minute walk to the beach, stunning balcony with a sea breeze that seems to never stop and an overall great energy and tasteful vibe to the house.

Great kitchen equipped with almost all you’ll ever need, a 6 minute drive to a shopping center for when you run out of carb, wine or sunscreen & Aria (the cute black house cat) is a nice and very non-demanding addition to this sea overlooking hacienda.



Will most definitely visit here again in the future!!!

TNX a bunch Maayan J

Mrs. Abramowitz's home is located on the second row of houses above one of the most beautiful beaches in Israel. It's an old house, not perfectly maintained, but it's nice and cozy and the warm and informal hospitality makes you feel at home right away.
Very nice and cozy apartment,  great kitchen,  we felt great there. Mrs Abramowitz is super nice! Thank you very much
This is a perfect place to live a dream time. The house is in front the ocean and has a magnificent view. The furniture is wonderful, all real antiques - everything is decorated with very good taste.
reviews.response: Thank you. It is lovely to host guests who appreciate quality and you are them :) Safe onward travels and a true pleasure to have met you both <3

reviews.comments:
It was a pleasure staying in this lovely home.
The sea view is unbelievable as well as the perfect breeze.
Seems like the owner really loves her home as there are many small pampering touches. Communication was easy and everything was as or better than described.
The quiet and beautiful beach is a short walking distance.
Looking forward to enjoying coffee on the balcony while looking at the sea soon!

היה מקסים

Der Ort und die Unterkunft ist sehr ruhig gelegen und die Unterkunft besticht durch einen roof top Balkon mit herrlicher Aussicht.
Der Strand ist in 5 min erreicht und war wenig besucht. Es fühlte sich wie ein Privatstrand an.
15 min zu Fuß entfernt, mit dem Auto 5 min gibt es einen bewachten Strand mit Strandbar, auch sehr schön.
Ein Einkaufsladen mit Allem, was man braucht, ist ebenfalls in der Nähe.
Die Gastgeberin ist sehr professionell, der Kontakt war super nett und schnell.
Wir kommen gerne wieder.

additional_house_rules:
הדירה ממוקמת בבית משותף. אסור להרעיש בדירה ולהפריעה לשכנים בבניין ובמתחם נופש.בזמן הדלקת מוסיקה יש לסגור חלונות בסלון. בעל הדירה לשמור על עצמו זכות לנעול את החלונות בסלון ואז החלל יתאוורר ברך בוידן על ידי מאוור שבחדר רחצה. פיקדון עבור  שמירת הדירה ותכולתה  מנזג מצד האורכים כולל גם אחראיותם על התנהגות טובה ומניעת רעשים והפרעות לשכנים.  האורחים מתבקשים (חובה) למסור למארח צילום של הדרקון וזה עקב דרישות של מס הכנסה מקומית.
The apartment is located in a common house. It is forbidden to make noise in the apartment and interfere with neighbors in the building and resort complex.At the time of lighting music should be closed windows in the living room. The owner of the apartment keep himself right to lock the windows in the living room and then the space will be ventilated Boyden knee by Mauer in the bathroom. A deposit for saving the apartment and its content merges on the part of the lengths also includes their responsibility for good behavior and Prevention of noise and interference to neighbors. Guests are asked (required) to hand over to the host a photocopy of the passport and this is due to requirements of local income tax.
transit: Имеется крытая парковка на одну машину (надо бронировать заранее).от аэропорта можно добираться на поезде а потом на автобусе номер 14 почти до места(150 м)  а также на такси или на такси из аэропорта.

We are sure you won't want to leave here, and once left,  will be eager to come back again.The spaceIt is known that three things are important for an apartment on vacation - location, location and location again. We fully meet this criterion - it is difficult to find a better place in Netanya. The beach with the famous elevator, the central square (Kikar), cafes, restaurants, supermarkets, pharmacies - all in the full sense of a stone's throw. It is really Nethanya's most desirable location - in the very centre of the city, 30 meters from the sea line and the famous shore elevator, main square restaurants and supermarkets. Very clean, stylish, fully equipped. Filling at home all the time. Private parking.
Super host in the full sense of the world. Will
Will be back for sure.
Great location, walk to beach, shops, flea market. Clean tidy, everything you need, safe. Would stay again
Great position, good communication and a lovely, well furnished flat

We really enjoyed our stay at Elena’s place. It’s very clean & fresh, and close to the beach & the central square. She lives close by and was available to answer our questions quickly. We would definitely stay there again.
clean and very smart

A really great and very clean apartment just around the corner of the beach and the shopping area. Communication was easy and fast, check in and check out super easy and Elena very friendly. You’re searching for a home away from home? So congratulations you found it. We will definitely book it again.
Very clean space. Nicely decorated. Centrally located. Very pleasant hosts.

Это тот случай, когда проживание делает ваш отдых великолепным! Огромное спасибо Елене и Михаилу, очень вежливые и приятные люди. Оперативно решали все вопросы. Квартира чистая, уютная со всем необходимым. С удовольствием вернемся сюда еще раз!

SUPERBE EMPLACEMENT !!! Tout à pieds . Très bon accueil avec le minimum de courses à l’arrivée . très agréable , eau , café , produits d’entretien , bouteille de vin blanc et fruits ect ... draps et serviettes changés régulièrement ( nous sommes resté 18 jours ) idéal pour Max 3 personnes je pense . Ascenseur.....très utile avec les bagages et les courses . DECO sympa . Conforme aux photos . Merci à Helena de nous avoir raccompagné jusqu’à la gare pour le départ.
A bientôt
очень гостеприимные хозяева, все организовали для нас и показали, доброжелательные люди. жилье 5 минут от пляжа и центральной площади, все чисто. рекомендуем!

Мы с парнем останавливались на одну ночь у Елены и Михаила. Если бы можно было поставить больше 5 звезд, то обязательно бы поставили! Отличное расположение в Нетании: близко пляж, супермаркеты и рестораны. Хорошая и чистая квартира, все соответствует фотографиям! Но главное -  крайне гостеприимные хозяева, всегда на связи и готовы были помочь даже больше, чем следует. По прибытию ожидали приятные комплименты. Советуем точно к посещению! Елена и Михаил, спасибо Вам!

reviews.comments:
Lynn & Shimon are wonderful hosts. They were very responsive and attended to every request we made.
Overall, the stay was great - the house is nice and large, and close to the beach and a big shopping mall.
One challenge about the house is that's adjacent to a kindergarten. It is a bit loud between around 9am and 3-4pm most days of the week.

We have stayed at many places around the world and this is one of the best.  The beds were amazing, the shower was great, and the rest of the house was roomy and comfortable.  The only problem, and it was a minor problem, was that the wifi did not work in the upstairs bedroom.

We stayed in this wonderful house for 8 days (parents with 3 kids). The house was very comfortable and cozy! It had all the necessary equipment - the kitchen had all the pots, plates and etc., there were washing and drying mashies. All the rooms were spacious enough and had wardrobes or/and drawers, we had room for all our clothes. The beds were very comfortable.
We visited Israel in the middle of July and it was very hot outside, but inside it was cool, thanks to AC. The house had an outside parking lot, and since we rented a car it was useful to us.
The location was also great, the beach was very close. A supermarket was just a 5 minutes walk away. In case you need to go to a pharmacy or to buy some clothes, there was a big mall around a 10 minutes walk away from the house.
The host, Lynn, was very helpful during our stay. She always responded quickly, if we had any questions. She also was flexible about our arrival and leaving. Besides, Lynn kindly helped us with things, which we had forgotten when leaving.
We enjoyed our stay!

Really enjoyed my stay here.
Big house- we only used one bedroom but it was nice to have a lovely kitchen and living room. Very convenient to get to Shopping by foot, and beach . Also highway is not far
To jump on and go anywhere for a day trip. Fun vacation
Great area of Israel !

There is a little gate to go through to get to Lynn’s front door. Every day when we were leaving the villa, we closed it. It doesn’t get locked. Every time when we were coming back, it was open. Many locks on the windows don’t work. During our stay a maintenance man stopped by and knocked on our door. We didn’t open it because we were not aware of this person coming. At the time of checking out the same person came and knocked on our door again. We opened it and found out that this man was a cleaning/maintenance person. We had a huge issue with cleanliness of the place, but overall it’s nice and comfortable, and has a plenty of everything you need for a stay.
reviews.response:
Helll Valeria,
During your stay we asked you multiple times if everything was okay and you had not brought any of this to my attention. Our maintenance person came at your request when you were unable to get the hot water to work. Upon checkout he is to come and gather the keys. As stated on our page unless we agree on a different check out time. It’s unfortunate that you choose this forum to tell
Me your complaints and not when you were in the home and given the time and the chance to fix it.
And if we’re on the subject of cleanliness- you left the house in a horrible state.

reviews.comments: Very nice place local and close to everywhere shopping entertainment etc. we had great time at that location we highly recommend Lynn’s place.

Lynn is a perfect hostess, who not only is available to address ANY AND ALL concerns, but she goes the extra mile to even have had cake and juice waiting for us after our lengthy flight to Israel.
Check in was hassle free and the accommodations were accurately listed. Her villa is clean, spacious and comfortable with written directions, how to’s and where to’s. This is a must stay if you need accommodations in Netanya.
Diana R. Kessler
The location is excellent and the house is very comfortable even for large families. we really enjoyed our stay and hope to come back soon!
I had a really pleasant time staying here - it was very spacious and perfect for our trip. The owner was very hospitable if we needed anything, 5/5 would recommend staying here again!
Great spot in the middle of Netanya

Lean's place was beyond amazing. It looks exactly like the pictures- was very helpful when I was planning our family vacation. When we arrived I felt like I know the place and we were able to unpack quickly. The house is super equipped with extra linen and towels and has all the kitchen items u can think of. It was easy and fun being there! There was even an adorable welcome basket with drinks and cake for my starving kids that just got off a 14 hours flight. Lean left us clear instructions on how to get around the house and the neighborhood and was very avilable to answer our random questions and make suggestions for our specific needs. The house was clean when we got there and had everything needed to keep it clean Including a washer and dryer that was really important for us. I loved the stylish design, there's warmth and love in every item :)  but the yard is by far my favorite part. It's big and private and absolutely beautiful! We can't wait to stay there again. Thank you Lean you are the best!!

The place is a real gem, not less. Huge but very comfortable house with 3 floors, large backyard and two parking spots. Sparkling clean, well equipped and in a really close proximity to everything. 4 minute drive to the sea shore (15 min walk) at the south (new) part of Netanya. No city traffic and no hassle. Lynn is very responsive (online) and Shimon (in Netanya) ready to help any time and about any issue.
Strongly recommended for families or few couples together.

This is a perfect place to spend a relaxing holiday and/or to explore the country.
Location is excellent, close to two supermarkets and the beach, with very easy access to the highway.
The house is wonderful, very spacious by israeli standards. It is equipped with everything you need, bedding is very comfortable. Special mention for the hot and cold water filter, sparing you the trouble of buying and carrying water bottles, and for the little attentions, soap and shampoo in the showers, cakes to welcome you in the fridge...
Also, Lynn was very responsive and accommodating. I would surely come back and recommend it to anyone.
Only negative point would be that the 5 rooms have double beds that can't be turned into twins.
reviews.response: Thank you for such wonderful feedback! It was a pleasure hosting you! Looking forward to hosting you again!

reviews.comments: Very nice apartment: clean, light, spacious, modern. The only one thing that I didn't like was that the nearest beach is quite far (15/20 min by foot) and is not that pretty (as for example in the center or on the other end of the city where the beach is more natural/wild thanks to the cliff). The owner also asks for being quiet.
Lynn’s place was great. Clean and comfortable. Thanks
Great location and house
It is really good house for 5 people. And clean
Lean, we had a wonderful time at your house. We especially enjoyed the comfortable beds, spacious living room and the yard. It was a lovely stay and we all enjoyed immensely. Thanks for everything!

This is a very good sized well equipped villa in a great location.
The kitchen is very well equipped but overall I felt that the house, especially the bathrooms were tired. Lynn was very prompt to respond to our messages

Lynn is a helpful and very responsive host, thank you, Lynn! The house is a great place to stay, the living room is very comfortable and much larger than we expected. The kitchen is well equipped. The five bedrooms are spartan but ok.

Netanja is not exactly what one would call romantic, it has a nice beach but otherwise expect lots of high-rising condos. And there is a kindergarden right next to the house which is quite noisy between 11 am and 1 pm....nevertheless, we enjoyed our stay and the house is a great starting point for sightseeing trips to the North.

Lynn’s place was great as usual, clean, very spacious and excellently located in a quiet neighborhood just next to the mall, main roads and beach.
We will be back to that place also next time.
Nice and spacious, good location!
Easy to deal with, grand location

Our stay in Lean's house was perfect. We already came last year and enjoyed as much our holidays because the house was still very clean and suburb very quiet. As there are big malls close by it is very easy to shop and get food or restaurants or anything you need. Lean is always very kind, responsive and helpful. Again, I really recommend to stay there and we look forward to coming back again as soon as we can. Lean, Thanks again for your kindness and trust, it was a great pleasure.
Fantastique house With all you can dream and mire!
Everything was fine and we enjoyed the time in Netanya! Lean was very helpful and communication went smoothly.

We had an amazing experience staying at Lean house at Netanya.
The house is spacious, well equipped with all the amenities & it was everything and more that Lean purported it to be.
It can accommodate easily up to 10 people comfortably, giving each one his/her own space.
Lean was very obliging & more than happy to accomodate & suit our needs.
It has certainly changed my opinion about Airbnb.
A very big thank you to Lean for being so helpful and accomodating.
Was an absolute pleasure to stay at her house and we would do it again in a heart bit.
Really highly recommend.
Merle & Reuv

A fantastic stay. The house is beautiful and secluded, yet near everything. There is a mall two minutes from the house with food and groceries. Lean was an wonderful host. Great if you keep Shabbos, right next to a shul. Couldn't have asked for better at  such a great price. Would love to go back.

The house of Lean was absolutely great, excellently located in a nice neighborhood, very clean and well equipped.
We really enjoyed!
If you are looking for spaces orderly apartments, relaxing holiday with quiet evenings on the terrace with a glass of wine is the best option for you.

במילה אחת: מושלם.
הרבה מעל הציפויות. וילה מאובזרת בכל מה שצריך בבית. מארחת נדיבה שגם אפשרה לנו להשאר מעבר לזמן שסוכם. מיקום מדהים במיוחד למשפחות. מאוד נהנינו. תודה על הכל.

We were a family of 10 people on Succoth and we enjoyed it, a nice house, a good atmosphere, clean, everything that is needed for a holiday is already there, more beautiful than the pictures, clean and bright rooms, Lin was very nice and available all the time. The sea is 5-10 minutes by car. In addition, it is very convenient for people who observe Shabbat.

Very good place, very clean and large house. Well equiped, nice garden and wonderfully located in Netanya. The district is very quiet.
Owners are very supportive and very kind.
I highly recommend this place

I'm absolutely sure that this house is one of the most incredible houses I've ever seen. Of course, the pictures help a lot, but the reality is better. A place with lots of green areas, just 15 minutes walk from the sea. Each bedroom following the same style with strong colors and the same space composition.
I would highly recomend Lean and her house every one who would like to have comfortable and nice holiday.
reviews.response: Thank you so much for the review! We are happy that you enjoyed your stay! Hope you visit us again!

reviews.comments: our stay was really great !!  the house is clean,  comfortable and functional. the hotes were very helpful and kind. we really felt at home. the neighborhood is great  too. thank you  very Much,  I highly recommend the place.
Buena ubicación agradable la estadía

Je vous conseil fortement de faire un état des lieux avec le manager car tout ce qui est endommagé et détérioré depuis des lustres vous seras reproché le matin même de votre départ Le mobilier de jardin est dangereux et les chaises tiennent approximativement.Le gazon usagé à 90% et synthétique .Baignoire rouillée. La robinetterie défectueuse
reviews.response: It’s a shame how you are writing false info. I have messages from you telling me everything is great and beautiful! Your just looking to write something negative after we have confronted you on how you poorly treated my home (broke lamps, stole towels, and ruined our couches to name a few). Sorry you had to resort to lies. I hope your home and that of your family is treated with more respect!!

reviews.comments:
Очень уютный и комфортный дом !
Неподалёку есть супермаркет и парк .
Отличная кухня с большим холодильником духовкой и посудомойкой , есть даже Куллер .
Довольно тихий район и не далеко от пляжей но удобнее добираться до моря на машине . Обязательно ещё сюда вернёмся .

Maison très spacieuse, confortable, très bonne situation géographique, proche magasins, plage, centre commercial.
Hôte gentille à l'écoute et attentive.
Manque coin d'ombre dans le jardin en plein été, mais le citronnier permet de se mettre à l'abri.
Notre séjour pour le mariage de ma fille et durant le conformément à été agréable grâce à la maison.

Vaste maison au sein du quartier très résidentiel de Poleg.
Très agréable et propre on a passé 6 jours très confortables.

איזה מקום נפלא!
הגענו לבית לחמשוש משפחתי עם שמונה מבוגרים וארבעה ילדים והיה פשוט מושלם!
מהתקשורת הקלה והזורמת והמענה המהיר של לין על כל שאלה, למיקום שממש כמה דקות נסיעה מהחוף ודקות הליכה מהסופר (ועוד כמה דקות הליכה לקניון עם אפשרות לבאולינג אם אתם בעניין). הבית היה מצוחצח והכיל כל מה שרק אפשר לבקש לסוף שבוע משפחתי. המיטות נוחות מאוד ולין דאגה שיובא לנו עוד מזרן מתנפח לנוחות עם אחד הילדים הקטנים.
אם אתם מחפשים מקום שקט ונקי עם אוירה טובה (ואין לכם עניין עם מדרגות- חדרי השינה בקומה השניה והשלישית של הבית)- זה יופי של מקום.
תביאו איתכם איזו בריכה קטנה לילדים לחצר- בכלת תתפנקו;)
ממליצים בחום!
אפרת, תמר וכל המשפוחה
Bonne situation géographique, proche des commerces et plages. Logement spacieux

Très belle maison vraiment très agréable et très conviviale et surtout très spacieuse pour une grande famille.le quartier est très sympa même si ce n’est pas le centre de Netanya vous y serez très vite en voiture et poleg est beaucoup plus calme.très bonne communication avec notre hôte .merci encore pour tout
Прекрасная вилла! lean дружелюбная хозяйка. Постараемся вернутся еще раз.
Tout était super. Belle maison. Belle personne  gentille et arrangeante. Endroit Magnifique avec tout à proximité et calme en même temps

L'appartement se trouve à proximité d'un supermarché, synagogue, gare centrale, shouk (marché), ainsi que du kikar. Jusqu’à 6 pers, idéal pour une famille!Yonatan est notre co-hôte. Il se peut qu’il vous réponde également. En cas de besoin c’est à lui qu’il faut s’adresser.

reviews.comments: Amzing communication! Great apartment! pictures don't do justice.
great place worth the money and there's a reason why it's cheaper. very spacious nice furnished 10 min walk from the beach and they can use a new cleaning crew. overall enjoyed my stay. thank you.
Perfect place to stay. Clean, beautiful and right by the beach !

The house was great.
The pictures don’t do justice, the house is much nicer!
Micheal was a great communicator and was very helpful.
The location was great.
Definitely a great stay. I will return!
Large apartment in the heart of Netanya
Great location and apartment. Just no cooking utensils.
Good communication from host, and a good value place for the price. Place wasn't in quite as good condition as expected, but had a very positive stay there regardless.
10/10 would recommend! Lovely, spacious apartment complete with full amenities. Michael was amazing and communicative. Check-in and check-out instructions were clear and simple. Thank you!!!
Beautiful home. Michael was amazing with communication and everything went smoothly.
reviews.response:
Very great person, good communication and happy to have them !
Hope to see you soon

reviews.comments: Host was responsive beyond expectation and even came down in the late hours of the night to open the door for when we got locked out by mistake.very clean and comfortable,great price
Great apartment with all amenities for a large family with 4 bedrooms and a hall. Convenient location. Loved it, will stay here again next time.
The apartment is lovely, perfect for three couples, with a private bath in each bedroom.  The apartment is newly rennovated, and is quite comfortable.  good location
The Apartment is in a convenient place, clean and offers all the amenities.
A nice, clean environment. The pictures are accurate. Very beautiful place.

reviews.comments:
The apartment was clean and beautiful. Easy communication with the host.
Excellent location, 10 minutes walk to beach.

Very nice, clean, comfortable, and spacious apartment, only one flight up. Excellent location, about 10 minutes walk to beach, same to city center. Each bedroom has its own en suite bathroom, which is really nice for privacy, plus there's an extra common bathroom, with washing and drying facilities. Shabbat friendly for religious guests. Master bedroom beds can be separated if necessary. We came as a couple with 4 children, and it was very comfortable for us!
Great place highly recommended
Top
Very clean, simple and elegant, every room has a bathroom, good location, highly recommended- we would stay here again.
H

היה נפלא, פרוספר תמיד היה זמין ונחמד. היה מאוד נוח עם מקלחת בכל חדר. דירה יפה מעוצבת בטעם ושמורה. מטבח נוח עם כלים לשימוש האורחים ומקרר גדול. מיקום טוב על ציר ראשי ובכל זאת דירה שקטה ונעימה. פרוספר דאג לוודא איתנו שהסתדרנו ועזר בכל נושא שעלה. ממליצים בחום

כשנכנסנו לדירה נדהמנו מכמה שהיא גדולה ורחבת ידיים. סלון, מטבח ופינת אוכל גדולים ומרווחים. 3 חדרי שינה שלכל אחד מהם יש שירותים ומקלחת צמודים, ועוד שירותים ומקלחת נפרדים לכל הדירה. (מקלחון אחד היה לא תקין, אבל כשיש 4 מקלחות, זה לא ממש בעיה).
בדירה היו מצעים, מוצרי רחצה בשפע וכלים חד פעמיים. היא היתה נקיה, מוארת ונעימה מאוד.
הדירה נמצאת בקומה הראשונה בפינת רחובות די סואנת, ולמרות זאת היא שקטה מאוד ולא מרגישים בכלל את הרחוב בחוץ. יש חניה חינם ברחובות הסמוכים ואפשרות גם להיכנס לחניה פרטית מתחת לבניין.
המארח היה זמין בווטסאפ ובטלפון וענה באדיבות ובמהירות לכל שאלה ובקשה (ואפילו הביא לנו מפתחות חלופיים כשנעלנו את עצמינו בטעות מחוץ לדירה)
בסך הכל הדירה היתה בסיס מעולה ליציאה לבילויים שלנו בחופשה ונהנינו ממנה מאוד.

דירה מצויינת.
נקיה,מרווחת.
קרוב לים כ10 דק.
הקשר עם מישל מצוין.
ממליצים מאוד למשפחות!!!
דירה גדולה, יש מקלחת ושירותים בכל חדר. יש את כל הציוד

מיכאל היה קשוב לכל מה שהיינו צריכים עשה ממשהרבה מעבר למצופה.זמינות ומענה מיידי.דירה נעימה נקיה מרווחת
ואילו הכשיר עבורנו לפסח את הדירה.
הדירה הייתה נקיה מאוד ומרווחת! מיכאל תקשר באופן זמין ומהיר. נחמד שהיה מכונת כביסה ומייבש. דירה שקטה מאוד ויחסית קרובה לכיכר העצמאות. כ15 ד הליכה. מומלץ
