description: Superbe appartement à l'angle Dizengof et Nordau, idéal pour les amoureux de la plage et de la vie nocturne à Tel Aviv. Toutes les saveurs culinaires vous attendent dans ce quartier et pour les inconditionnels du shoppings, le port et son centre commercial en plein air ne se trouvent qu'à quelques minutes. Votre hôte vous accueillera et sera à votre écoute durant tout votre séjour.The space2 chambres et 2 salles de bain dans un immeuble boutique donnant sur un petit parc.
additional_house_rules: LATE ARRIVAL : All arrival that will take place after 20.00 PM, will be charged 200 Nis
interaction: Nous serons disponibles pour vous de votre arrivée à votre départ hormis le samedi et jours fériés.

reviews.comments: David is a lovely host and we appreciated his flexibility and communication. The apartment is very clean and in a lovely location. Two important things to know if you’re not from Tel Aviv: parking can be an issue and if you bring bikes make sure to lock them up even inside the building. The apartment easily fit our 3/4 people. The beds were clean and comfortable and the air conditioning was great. The apartment is a good place to access Tel Aviv.

The apartment was very comfortable. The decor was nice, the beds were comfortable, the dishes were clean,  and the place was very clean overall. The location of this apartment is what makes the value so incredible. I have been to Tel Aviv 25 times through out my life and I have never stayed in a better location. Between the beach and the port of Tel Aviv there is not much more you could need, but if you do the city is right there as well. The host, David, was the most helpful host I have ever encountered while staying at an Air bnb. David told me about all the potential problems with the air bnb and outside factors before I finished booking the apartment. He was also close by all the time and when I got locked out of the apartment, he was there in 5 minutes to help me out. Overall I had a amazing experience at David’s Air BnB . I would recommend for anyone looking to really enjoy all the parts of Tel Aviv the stay here.

David is an amazing and kind host. I have rated my stay with David high, even if I stayed for only one night out of my 10 day booking. There was some unexpected construction work ( not known to the host) and when I have informed him, David agreed to refund my stay fully and help me find alternative accommodation. He even helped me with my luggage and checked if my my new accommodation is good and safe. The apartment itself is high end and in a great location in Tel Aviv, I wish I would have been able to stay longer. I truly recommend staying here and  hope to be able to book this location again in the future.

David’s place was absolutely amazing! We were sad to leave after a month stay. It was equipped with everything we needed and David was fast to respond when we reached out. The location was amazing, it’s very close to many restaurants - highly recommend checking out Brooklyn pizza. The apartment over looks a cute park and we loved the morning light that comes into the apartment. The apartment has electronic blinds in every room that completely insulates. The place has an open kitchen and living room with 1 large bedroom & a shower in the room, a second smaller bedroom with a single bed and an additional detached shower and than a separate toilet. We were there during the recent war with Gaza and we’re glad to find out that the building has a shelter (basement) to go to during the alarms. And the park has a very large shelter as well. I would highly recommend this place for your next stay in Israel! We will definitely be back again!

A wonderful apartment— a real Tel Aviv gem. The location is above a park, so beautiful greenery every morning. Stylish, spacious apartment that was very roomy for a family of 3. They even had toys for our toddler! Also has a laundry machine (helpful for a family). Generous hospitality from our host, who responded to our every need. Hope to return for our next visit to Tel Aviv!

This apartment is in a perfect location in Tel Aviv close to the beach, bars, restaurants and Hayarkon Park. We stayed with 2 kids under 3 years old and it was very kid friendly. The pictures are accurate and the apartment was clean comfortable and felt spacious for a 2 bedroom. Lastly, the communication with the host was seamless and very timely if and when we had any issues.

We’ve stayed a month at David’s lovely apartment, and we’ve had a very nice experience!!! The apartment is comfortable and is well equipped (including some toys which our daughters appreciated a lot). The place is also very quiet and is facing a nice playground, which is also a big plus if you have kids. Furthermore, its location is absolutely perfect- close to Mezizim beach, the port, and Hayarkon park (all at 10 minutes walk). Lastly, despite not getting the chance to meet David, he was always available to answer any questions, asking how we are doing, and was generally very helpful. Thank you!

A great apartment with two bedrooms right in the center of TLV. It overlooks a small park and has a beautiful view. There is everything in the apartment necessary for a long-term stay. Yoni answered fast to all the questions we had. There were four of us in the apartment. The apartment is even more spacious than on the pictures. Highly recommend.
We have had a great time. The appartement is near the beach and has all restaurants and bars nearby. It was very clean and comfortable and very good furnished. Joni as been a nice and gentle host.
Great spot in the heart of modern part of telaviv. Perfect location for hangout, shoppings, night vibes. I was there with familly (2 adults + 1 kid), great kids facilities nearby.

Amazing, clean, fresh, bright apartments.
Beautiful view to the small park. It's very good for Tel- Aviv. Pretty quiet (for TLV).
Perfect location and area. The best beach is near and way is simpatic.
Convinient apartments.
Friendly owners.
We were happy to spent 5 days there!
Super appart à tout point de vue emplacement, confort, lumière, pas de bruit, prestations... . David est top, réactif, arrangeant accueillant bref, je recommande

Merci Yoni, merci David! Tout s'est très bien passé, nous avons eu un très bon contact. Yoni nous a fourni tous les renseignements nécessaires avant notre arrivée et a pris régulièrement de nos nouvelles pendant le séjour. Tout est exactement comme sur les photos, l'emplacement est super, nous avons apprécié l'organisation spatiale de l'appartement et la vue depuis le séjour. L'appartement, très propre, convenait parfaitement à nos besoins. Nous y retournerons avec plaisir.
Une situation idéale pour cet appartement agréable à vivre. Belles vue et luminosité. J’ai beaucoup apprécié y séjourner durant 3 semaines.

Recomendo!!!

reviews.response:
